summary: Medication form enhancement: add PRN checkbox behavior on Add Medications.

existing_features.title: Update the Add Medication modal UI to include a PRN checkbox positioned next to the Administration Times label, and when PRN is checked hide/disable the Administration Times inputs and suppress any related validation errors.
Update the Edit Medication modal to display and allow editing the PRN flag with the same hide/disable and validation-suppression behavior for Administration Times when PRN is checked.
Update medication list display to clearly represent PRN medications and avoid showing administration times when PRN is true.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add PRN checkbox next to Administration Time in Add Medications; when checked hide/disable Administration Time, suppress its validation errors, and store PRN as a boolean.
Add a boolean PRN flag to the Medication data model in the backend and ensure it is persisted and returned in all resident medication read/write operations.

projectName: Add PRN checkbox to Medication form and persist PRN flag
